name: ROLL AND CRAWL
description:
KNOWN ISSUE: The visible value on the die and the actual value are different, sorry!


HOW TO PLAY

1. Roll the dice by dragging it. Now you can move!
2. Move on the tile by clicking LMB on it
3. Explore the map and manage your resources
4. Find the way to meet DICE KING
5. ???
6. Return back home!

ROLL TO CRAWL AND SLICE AND HOARD!

A curious dicefolk teen DeeSix got into an unknown board game by accident.
Aid naive and brave DeeSix in their finding-the-way-home-quest!
This is how the story starts rolling. Will you get to the end of the board?

Created for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours by six people and one skull worm.

TEAM (in alphabetical order)

  • Angelina ‒ concept art
  • Bohdan Sereda ‒ production and music
  • Denis Novikov ‒ special effects and animations
  • Kirill Korepanov ‒ development and delivery
  • Sergey Ryzhov ‒ visual development and art
  • Yaroslav Kravtsov ‒ game design and prototyping
